biography: Jarkko, affectionately known as "Bailando" among his peers, is a familiar face at the Hector Trophée, representing his home club, Hirsala Golf, with distinction. Known for his calm demeanor and strategic play, Jarkko has become a respected competitor in the tournament.

With eight past appearances at the Hector Trophée, Jarkko brings a wealth of experience to the course. His dedication and skill have not gone unrewarded, as he has previously captured the coveted Hector Trophée title, as well as the individual Victor Trophy, marking him as a formidable player in both team and individual formats.

As he prepares for his ninth appearance at the Hector Trophée in 2025, Jarkko remains an active and enthusiastic participant. Spectators and fellow competitors alike eagerly anticipate his performance, as he continues to contribute to the event's rich history.
